column4: since dist-upgrading to edgy beta i have no borders in gnome. how to solve this?
thing is its drawing everything else..
yes. but do you think that is the case as it draws everything else perfectly..
Xorg 7.1 has AIGLX enabled by default - so - look for problem with your video driver and aiglx
I had similar problem w 7.1 - no window backgrounds w ati card when running XGL/AIGLX.
i am not able to install the driver...
./ati-installer.sh:176: syntax error: Bad substitution. i always needed to use the ati driver from homepage and build pkgs for my self
wait a min. You used apt-get install xorg-video-driver-ati?
wait a min. You used apt-get install xorg-video-driver-ati?
so - why are you not using drivers provided by apt?
then why you ask for help? go for help to ati site
